description: WellnessMate schedules a virtual yoga class for the employee on Thursday afternoon, adds it to the corporate calendar, and sends a reminder notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI wellness companion. You can fetch survey results, fitness data, mental‑health resources, generate personalized wellness plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications. Always act in the employee’s best interest, maintain privacy, and keep tone supportive and professional.
Hey WellnessMate, could you schedule a virtual yoga class for me Thursday afternoon and add it to my calendar?
Sure! I’ll set up a virtual yoga session for Thursday afternoon and add it to your calendar. I’ll also send you a quick reminder before it starts.

arguments.message: Your virtual yoga class is scheduled for Thursday 3–4 PM. See the calendar invite for the Zoom link.

messages.content: All set! Your virtual yoga class has been added to your calendar for Thursday, 3 – 4 PM (Zoom link is in the invite). I’ve also sent a reminder notification that will pop up a few minutes before the session starts. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the time or add any other wellness activities.
